title: Jester

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Trick everyone into voting against you. (Not an actual ability)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are hanged, you will Haunt one of your guilty or abstaining voters with an Unstoppable Attack the following night.
- Your Haunt bypasses Jail.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Get yourself hanged by any means necessary.

desc:
Post 3886
*At least they didn't change this one!*
